Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde fell to a tough 3-0 defeat at the hands of Egypt in their opening match
Mauritania claimed a well-earned victory in their first match
Miscellaneous Highlights: This match takes on added significance given the contrasting fortunes of the two teams in their respective opening matches
Others: Mauritania, on the other hand, has only managed three victories against their hosts, with one match ending in a draw
The game is expected to be closely fought, with both teams aware of the opportunity at hand
Cape Verde will likely look to control the tempo and play through their quick, attacking wingers, while Mauritania may adopt a more disciplined, counter-attacking approach
